thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Ochrony Srodowiska Plans Share Capital Increase Of Up To 400 Mln Zlotys

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank Ochrony Srodowiska Plans Share Capital Increase Of Up To 400 Mln Zlotys
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - BANK OCHRONY SRODOWISKA SA:
* SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE ON FEB. 13 ON COâ€˜S SHARE CAPITAL INCREASE VIA SHARES ISSUE
* PLANS TO INCREASE SHARE CAPITAL BY NOT MORE THAN 400 MILLION ZLOTYS
* PLANS TO RAISE SHARE CAPITAL BY ISSUANCE OF UP TO 40 MILLION SERIES V SHARES
* SERIES V SHARES TO BE OFFERED IN PRIVATE SUBSCRIPTION WITHOUT PRE-EMPTIVE RIGHTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
